title: Igrejinha (Rua da)
body: It had as its boundaries the largo do Colégio and the rua das Pretas. At its end, where the largo da Igrejinha is now located, stood the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Piedade, or, as it was commonly called, the Igrejinha, founded in 1613 by Domingos Rodrigues Garcez and demolished by the City Council in 1836.

Largo do Colégio: Boundary of the rua da Igrejinha
Rua das Pretas: Boundary of the rua da Igrejinha
Largo da Igrejinha: Location where the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Piedade stood

Domingos Rodrigues Garcez: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Piedade

1613: Foundation of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Piedade
1836: Demolition of the chapel by the City Council
